nodes.text: You examine the computer carefully. Your analytical mind discovers a couple of methods that will ease the removal of the water chip.
You did not remove the chip. Perhaps you should try again, this time a little more carefully.
You learn nothing special about the water computer.
After shutting down the Water Purification Computer, you can now hear the repaired water pump working in the distance, bringing water up from what must be a deep well under Necropolis.
You are too far away to carefully examine the water computer.
Your search the water processing control computer is successful. You find the water chip without a problem.
You easily remove the water chip from the computer. You hear the flow of water to the city stop.
You learn nothing special about the water computer.
You gain experience points for getting a water chip.
You struggle with the computer for a while, but you cannot remove the chip. After a moment, you realize you forgot to remove the locking bolts.
You reinstall the water chip into the computer. The computer reboots after a moment, and proceeds to function as normal.
You search the water computer. It takes a while but you eventually discover the water chip.
This item cannot be used on the computer.
